elements.title: Advanced Infrastructure
elements.description: Advanced Infrastructure's mission is to create a greener and fairer Energy System by making big data, transparency, and traceability accessible to all users of the energy system.

elements.title: Aquicore
elements.description: Aquicore is an analytics software to drive profitable, sustainable, and resilient buildings. Keyframe invested in them

elements.title: QOS energy
elements.description: monitoring and optimisation of renewable generation assets

elements.title: Buildings IOT
elements.description: We develop and deploy cloud-based building analytics software, we implement complex Integrated Building Management Systems, we design and install controls systems, we maintain building assets and we provide IT managed services.

elements.title: Metrikus
elements.description: Metrikus is a platform that helps to make buildings more efficient. Implemented at Met Office HQ, [in the news](https://www.twinfm.com/article/monitoring-energy-usage-at-met-office-hq)

elements.title: Twaice
elements.description: Our predictive analytics increase the lifetime, efficiency ​and sustainability of batteries. raised 26M in May 2021, [in the news](https://techcrunch.com/2021/05/19/twaice-raised-26m-to-scale-its-battery-analytics-software/)​

elements.title: Cortex
elements.description: Cortex is built to dramatically improve how buildings operate by applying software and analytics to highly underutilized data streams. By building the software and analytics layer overtop these disparate data streams, we can fundamentally improve the sustainability of commercial buildings, the value of those assets, and the experience of occupants inside them.

elements.title: Grid edge
elements.description: Grid edge is an energy analytics platform for commercial buildings. They want to change the way that people use energy by putting data-driven, intelligent control into the hands of commercial energy consumers. Has [raised 2.5M in Oct 19](https://www.bp.com/en/global/corporate/news-and-insights/press-releases/bp-expands-its-digital-energy-portfolio-by-investing-in-energy-management-platform-grid-edge.html) from BP Ventures

elements.title: CO2 Analytics
elements.description: CO2 Analytics integrates with Xero to provide carbon footprint Measurement & Management Platform for Small and Midsize Businesses
